attributes.action: Force an enquiry into allegations of paedophilia in Westminster
attributes.additional_details:
Given the allegations against Sir Cyril Smith and others, the destruction of relevant documents and that the MP who reported the allegations had his constituency home and London residence broken into without a theft taken place, the government should open a public enquiry into the allegations, and mishandling of evidence as detailed here:

http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-28141531
